title: Virtual Reality-Based Chemical Process Visualization and Operational Training

context.prior_knowledge: General Chemistry, Basic Chemical Engineering, and Fundamental Process Engineering Concepts
context.additional_context: Addressing the lack of industrial field experience by offering immersive VR learning environments. Fostering practical skills through hazardous scenario simulations

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify over 90% of actual equipment components by exploring a 3D virtual model of a chemical process plant.
Learners can successfully handle at least three abnormal situations (e.g., pipe leaks, reactor overheating) in VR simulations while applying safety protocols.
Based on team-designed virtual process flowcharts, produce and present a 15-minute operational simulation video
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
